en-US.summary: Guess a number, and Alexa will tell you if you need to guess higher or lower.
en-US.name: Counter Club
en-US.description: You have decided to volunteer at the Counter club which specializes in number based memory exercises! Take the test yourself and see if you can remember well enough to earn a passing score. You will earn a rating based on how well you do.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Responding with yes or no when a question is asked. The fallback handler is active.
